players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "I am shocked by Alice's death. We need to be careful and figure out who the mafia is."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out immediately."
Charlie: "I am the detective and I investigated Diana last night. She is the mafioso. Don't believe her lies about me."
Diana: "Charlie is lying. I am the detective and he is mafioso. Bob, we must vote Charlie out to win."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
